item.title: Report E-2023090554
item.description:
Report E-2023090554

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: JANESVILLE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On September 1, 2023, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN3287 was crushed during transit and released approximately less-than one (<1) gallon of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. HCE personnel utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. All spent absorbents and debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged 55-gallon drum of product was placed into one (1) 95-gallon drum.

item.title: Report X-2023081911
item.description:
Report X-2023081911

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: 2 of the 4 plastic bottles are leaking out of their caps, and one has a small tear or hole in the plastic. the contents where not packed properly ne packing materials used and or no corrugated dividers or liners. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into a plastic spill bag and tote then into the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023081906

  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was put up the sorting station and the box was found wet. DescribePack: One of four plastic bottles containing a corrosive liquid has leaked out a small amount of its contents through a loose cap with a bad under cap seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into a plastic spill bag then into a tote. lastly into the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023081878
item.description:
Report X-2023081878

  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the hazmat cage. the box made its way up the normal sorting line. DescribePack: the caps are loosened, and the contents have leaked out on 2 of the bottles. the box looks as if it was flipped on its top(there are cap dents in the top of the box). DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into a plastic spill bag and the into a tote, lastly into the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023081624
item.description:
Report X-2023081624

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage, upon inspection found the box damaged. once opened found that one of four glass bottles of methanol has broken and spilled out its contents. the box the box does look as if it were dropped or crushed hard on one side. this is on the same side as the damaged bottle. DescribePack: there is a dent in the box just over halfway up it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into a plastic spill bag and then into a hazmat tote, lastly into the hazmat cage.
